greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} 1/(1+2*x^k).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
mathematica: nmax = 40; CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/(1 + 2*x^k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 25 2015 *)
nmax = 40; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[Sum[(-1)^k*2^k/k*x^k/(1-x^k), {k, 1, nmax}]], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 25 2015 *)
results.author: Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), May 27 2002
